EmailTemplate.name: IACP 2011.Invite-IACP (IMC Law only)
EmailTemplate.subject: Visit with TriTech's Imc Solutions at IACP in Chicago
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
See you at the 118th Annual Conference l October 23-25 l Chicago, IL International Association of Chiefs of Police
As the National Sales Director for TriTech's Imc Solutions, I would like to personally invite you to visit Booth #2019 at the IACP Conference. We will be exhibiting with our parent company, TriTech Software Systems. Stop by, say hello and enter to win an iPad 2.
Enter to Win an iPad 2 at Booth #2019
Regards,
Phil Sisk National Sales Director | Imc Solutions TriTech Software Systems
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
